ygData.msgSnippet: That s another annoying problem. I was running with a monk that became pk (I ll use pk and nonpk because it s less confusing to me) and the cleric in the party
ygData.messageBody:
That's another annoying problem. I was running with a monk that became
pk (I'll use pk and nonpk because it's less confusing to me) and the cleric
in the party wouldn't help him at all. He even said, don't heal me, don't
buff me or you'll become pk. Very cool of him.

As to the looting issue, that's absurd. (In your favor) NO ONE should be
able to loot your body unless they personally killed you. Another point for
you, and that's something that I think they need to address. I didn't know
that just anyone could pick stuff off your body. As a matter of fact, I'd
make looting a pk body that you didn't kill turn you pk. That'd be more
reasonable I think. Believe me, no one's picking on you, maybe taking the
easy way out, but not singling out pk players.

As to coding the changes. It's more than likely that it's easier to make
them not be able to cast anything on you instead of being selective. As a
matter of fact I KNOW it'd be easier that way. It's like having 1 switch to
turn on all the lights in your house, or running around and turning some on
and some off.

All in all though, I think that for the moment, it'd be better to just enjoy
the game as is for the moment, and work towards what changes you'd like.
There's a fdback button there, use it and have all the pk players you know
use it as well. Good to hear the comments though.

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro
